page.title: 13A TYPICAL DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My week is all the same.All the time,"Your turn to do the dishes, I did them yesterday." In my family I have one sister (Laura) and my parents.I also have a dog.I get up at seven and then about seven-thirty I have my breakfast.At school we do maths, language, art, gym, activities, listen to the radio or watch TV.We do reading and project.I do lots of gardening after school.In the evenings I watch things like "Dallas" and "Dynasty." At weekends I often go to the school park and play with my friends.In the afternoons I go swimming or to gymnastics.Sometimes I go into Aberdeen to shop.
